author: @agensir
title: Terra Santa: padre Faltas (vicario Custodia), “strage di Erode si ripete. Abbiamo visto le immagini di migliaia di bambini morti avvolti in un telo bianco” - AgenSIR
text: “La strage degli innocenti, voluta da Erode, si ripete a distanza di duemila anni”. Sono parole drammatiche quelle pronunciate ieri da padre Ibrahim Faltas, vicario della Custodia di Terra Santa, nel giorno in cui la Chiesa ha celebrato i Santi innocenti martiri. Il francescano ha ripercorso il brano del Vangelo dove si racconta della “forza violenta dell’odio e del male su un gruppo di bambini innocenti, massacrati dalla sete di volere salvare a tutti i costi il suo potere assoluto”. “Purtroppo – ha subito aggiunto – questo brano del Vangelo di oggi non è rimasto là, relegato nel passato remoto, ma ha attraversato i secoli e si è fermato, ingigantito, nel nostro presente di oggi. Oggi lo stiamo vivendo in prima persona, abbiamo visto le immagini di migliaia e migliaia di bambini morti, avvolti in un telo bianco, e migliaia di bambini vagare tra le macerie, con lo sguardo impaurito, avvolti dalla polvere alla ricerca della mamma e del papà che non ci sono più. Sono più di diecimila tra i bambini morti e orfani. Sono i nuovi innocenti di questo secolo, colpevoli forse di essere nati a Gaza o a Kiev o a Damasco, ma innocenti testimoni martiri della disumanità di una logica umana che non esiste, che ha spezzato il futuro di una nuova generazione, e sepolto sotto questo esteso cumulo di macerie ogni pensiero di Pace”. Padre Faltas ha quindi proseguito: “I bambini innocenti martiri, oggi, della guerra che è in atto, qui nella nostra terra, come in altre guerre dimenticate nel mondo, hanno nomi reali di bambini, ma sono anche giovani coppie, anziani, ammalati… che dal cielo aspettano la risposta della nostra carità e della nostra preghiera. Siamo nel terzo millennio e in tante parti della terra, la strage dei ‘piccoli innocenti’ continua tragicamente, esiste una popolazione di bambini che non hanno da mangiare, malati che non ricevono cure, purtroppo spesso sfruttati e vittime di violenze. Sono i ‘nuovi martiri innocenti’ di oggi, una piaga terribile del nostro mondo di oggi. Non possiamo accettare che la gente è al freddo, senza pane, senza acqua, senza elettricità, senza casa, senza un luogo sicuro dove trovare riparo. Dobbiamo agire e fermare questo scandalo intollerabile, che vede vittime i bambini”.

author: Will Schube
title: Kanye West Allegedly Gave Milo Yiannopoulos Actual N-Word Pass | HipHopDX
text: [Kanye West](https://hiphopdx.com/artist/kanye-west) gave his former Yeezy chief of staff [Milo Yiannopoulos](https://hiphopdx.com/news/kanye-west-2024-presidential-campaign) an actual “N-word pass,” according to the controversial far-right figure. Yiannopoulos took to X (formerly Twitter) on Wednesday (August 14) to share photos of the physical card that Yeezy purportedly gave him that allows him to freely use the racial slur without repercussions, despite him being white. AD LOADING... The front of the pass features a photo of Milo underneath the words: “N-word Pass” and “Lifetime Membership.” On the back is a screenshot of a text conversation between the Chicago rapper and his former employee which outlines the X-rated reason behind his freedom to use the N-word. AD LOADING... “I only let people say n-gger that have sucked n-gger cock,” Kanye wrote in the messages, seemingly referencing [Milo’s past homosexuality](https://www.independent.co.uk/news/world/americas/us-politics/milo-yiannopoulos-ex-gay-b1815296.html). Yiannopoulos replied: “Can confirm” with two crying laughing face emojis. Revealing that the card was given to him by Ye, Milo captioned the post: “crazy[.] thanks ye.” crazy thanks ye [pic.twitter.com/vqFljgqY8j] — Milo Yiannopoulos (@Nero) [August 15, 2024] [Milo Yiannopoulos departed Kanye West’s Yeezy company in May](https://hiphopdx.com/news/kanye-west-milo-yiannopoulos-yeezy-porn), saying in a statement: “I wish Ye every success in the future. I have some concerns about his new team, and hope he proceeds with caution.” The political commentator, who began serving as his chief of staff in 2022, had [expressed opposition to Ye’s reported adult film venture Yeezy Porn](https://hiphopdx.com/news/kanye-west-yeezy-porn-milo-iannopoulos-gay) (which has yet to materialize). AD LOADING... “I cannot be complicit in the production or dissemination of pornographic films and literature, for moral and religious reasons,” he wrote in a letter shared online. “But also, because such material and the kind of people invariably involved in its production represent an imminent danger to my life as a recovering addict and an unacceptable risk to my spiritual and physical health as a former homosexual.” Since his exit, Yiannopoulos has made explosive allegations about Kanye’s private life and inner circle, [claiming that the rap mogul is battling a dangerous nitrous oxide addiction](https://hiphopdx.com/news/kanye-west-nitrous-gas-addiction-brain-damage-dentist-milo-yiannopoulos) and that his dentist is to blame. In a [sworn affidavit](https://ludovicus.wpengine.com/files/pdf/cdbcompaffidavit.pdf) filed against celebrity dentist Thomas Connelly to the California Dental Board, Milo accused Connelly of charging West more than $50,000 per month for the illegal supply of the gas, which is typically used to reduce a patient’s pain and anxiety during dental procedures. AD LOADING... Yiannopoulos claimed that Kanye has since become hooked on the stuff and his health is suffering, with the rapper exhibiting “distressing symptomps” and becoming “incomprehensible and contradictory” in his communication. [Connelly has vehemently denied the allegations](https://hiphopdx.com/news/kanye-west-nitrous-gas-proof-leaked-texts), accusing Yiannopoulos of trying “damage” his reputation due to a personal grievance.

author: Kokou Adzo
title: Valyuz Review – Things that Make this Dedicated IBAN Account Provider worth Trying
text:
Valyuz is a popular payment service provider used by loads of businesses across the globe. With more and more businesses receiving and sending payments online, it only makes sense to choose a payment solutions provider to cater to their particular needs. In this review, I will be giving you a look into how choosing this company could give you the edge you seek when it comes to streamlining payments for your organization. You will get to learn about its various offerings and how they could meet your specific requirements.
A Focus on Quick Payments
The business world can be incredibly fast and relentless and leave you behind if you do not make an active effort to keep up. Believe it or not, there have been loads of cases over the years, where people have stopped their operations, simply because they were not able to make or receive their payments in a timely and secure manner. However, when you choose a dedicated IBAN account provider like Valyuz, you will not have to face such troubles again. This company offers a
business debit card program that your can utilize for your offline and online needs.
What’s more, you can withdraw a wide array of currencies in different parts of the globe, a convenience that you may not find with a lot of other companies. You can also take advantage of Valyuz’s offerings if you run a major corporation and seek tailored solutions. By signing up, you will get access to an online IBAN account that you can use whenever and wherever you want. Plus, you will be able to receive and send funds using SWIFT protocols, SEPA and plenty more, ensuring that everything is hassle free.
Seamlessly Open an Account
Getting started with this dedicated IBAN account provider is a walk in the park, as all you need to do is provide the required information on Valyuz’s website. It would be fair to say that the process is quite similar to other advanced payment solution providers but the form that you will need to fill is not as extensive. You will need to specify the type of account you require, the nature of your business and some other basic details about yourself. Once you submit these details, the team at Valyuz will carefully verify your information, making sure that you are who you claim to be.
Once they go through your detail and find that your information is correct, you will gain swift access to your account. Exploring this advanced payment solutions provider is pretty straightforward as its platform is made to cater to the needs of new and experienced traders. I spent hours upon hours on their platform and found it to be quite intuitive, allowing me to find the solutions that I was looking for with ease.
Extensive Knowledge Base for Users
One thing that really impressed me about Valyuz is that this dedicated business IBAN account provider does everything in its power to educate its vast user base. A large number of people are not familiar with things like debit card for corporate expenses, online IBAN account solutions and whatnot, so it can be difficult for them to understand and utilize these solutions for their particular business requirements. When you choose this company, however, you can breathe a sigh of relief knowing that you will gain access to a vast knowledge base that you can utilize for understanding the features on offer.
It is worth mentioning here that the information available on this company’s website can come in handy for new and experienced individuals, giving them a clear understanding of what to expect when creating an account with Valyuz.
Professional Customer Assistance
This business debit card provider takes the matter of customer support very seriously because it is aware how big of a difference it can make for users. No matter how big of a business you run, there may come a time when you need instant help from customer support. This is where signing up with a business debit card provider like Valyuz can prove to be advantageous, providing you instant access to its seasoned customer support representatives.
One thing that really stood out to me about the customer support team here is that they are quite patient when it comes to listening to your queries. Once they understand your problem, they take the time to find a solution that addresses your requirements, making sure that you can continue to operate your business without any hassle.
Final Thoughts
Wrapping this review, up will say that Valyuz is a dedicated IBAN account provider that doesn’t let its users down. Its solutions are suitable for different business types, making sure that they have the edge to succeed and stand out.

author: Julio Cortés
title: La Liga Antidifamación responde ante la disculpa de Kanye West por comentarios antisemitas
text:
La Liga Antidifamación responde ante la disculpa de Kanye West por comentarios antisemitas
En un comunicado la Liga Antidifamación informó que acepta las disculpas de Kanye West a la comunidad judía por sus comentarios antisemitas, pero que las acciones del rapper "hablarán más fuerte que las palabras"
Hace algunos días
Kanye West publicó en su cuenta de Instagram un largo mensaje en el que pedía disculpas a la comunidad judía por los comentarios antisemitas que ha hecho desde 2022. Ahora, la Liga Antidifamación (organización en Estados Unidos encargada de detener las expresiones de odio al pueblo judío) ha hecho pública su respuesta.
En un comunicado, representantes de ese gremio expresaron lo siguiente: “Después de causar un daño incalculable al utilizar su vasta influencia y plataforma para envenenar innumerables mentes con antisemitismo y odio despiadados, una disculpa en hebreo puede ser el primer paso en un largo viaje hacia la reparación de la comunidad judía y de todos aquellos a quienes (Kanye West) ha lastimado. En última instancia, las acciones hablarán más que las palabras, pero este acto inicial de contrición es bienvenido”.
Adicionalmente, un vocero del Congreso Judío de Estados Unidos criticó que el rapper haya compartido en sus redes sociales un mensaje en hebreo y no en idioma inglés, evitando así una exposición mayor de sus disculpas a judíos estadounidenses y de otros países: “Más allá de ser extraña y posiblemente una estrategia para ganar más atención, la disculpa hebrea -publicada sin traducción- es inaccesible para la mayoría de los judíos estadounidenses que no hablan el idioma. Aunque él afirma que está comprometido con el aprendizaje y una mayor comprensión, esta disculpa habla de “cualquier dolor que pueda haber causado”, en lugar de reconocer el dolor que él ha causado”.
El mensaje de West -traducido al español- expone sus disculpas y su compromiso a tomar otra actitud a partir de ese momento: “Pido disculpas sinceramente a la comunidad judía por cualquier estallido involuntario causado por mis palabras o acciones. No era mi intención lastimar ni faltarle el respeto, y lamento profundamente cualquier dolor que haya podido causar. Me comprometo a comenzar conmigo mismo y aprender de esta experiencia para asegurar una mayor sensibilidad y comprensión en el futuro. Su perdón es importante para mí, y estoy comprometido a enmendar y promover una mayor unidad”.
Kanye West no sólo ha acaparado titulares en los últimos días por esos mensajes, sino también por el anuncio del lanzamiento de su próximo álbum Vultures Vol. 1, en colaboración con el rapper Ty Dolla $ign. Tras varios retrasos en su estreno, finalmente el disco estará disponible en las principales plataformas digitales el 12 de enero de 2024.
Sigue leyendo:

author: Christian Bone
title: Ordained psychopath Marjorie Taylor Greene has advice for Christian women ‘not being good role models’
text: Do we think [Marjorie Taylor Greene](https://wegotthiscovered.com/tag/marjorie-taylor-greene) has a long checklist of topics that she has no right to speak about but really wants to, with all the nuance of Leatherface with his chainsaw? The latest, it seems, is how to be a good role model for young women, which is possibly one of the last areas many would turn to MTG for advice on, right up there with [how to pronounce the word “indictable.” ](https://wegotthiscovered.com/news/crushingly-stupid-moron-marjorie-cant-pronounce-indictable-but-at-least-tom-cotton-finally-learned-the-difference-between-china-and-singapore/) Waking up this morning with a desire to turn feminism back 60 years, Taylor Greene took to Twitter to scold her fellow “conservative Christian women” out there who are supposedly “selling themselves short” by “conforming to the world’s sexualization of women” and therefore “not being good role models.” The further Marjorie goes into her prehistoric polemic, the more you have to balk at the unmitigated gall. “Men will respect you more and think of you much more highly than just a sexual object for gratification,” she advised, presumably tweeting from somewhere in the 1700s. “It’s also good to not tempt your Christian brothers and cause them to stumble,” she added — a truly startling statement that is a mere tiptoe away from outright victim-blaming. “As conservative Christian women let us always be an example to girls and young women by displaying actions that our faith believes and not conform to the patterns of this fallen world,” Marj continued. “Be the light, don’t fall into the darkness.” A beautiful sentiment there, from someone who has just recently displayed [unrepentant transphobia](https://wegotthiscovered.com/politics/marjorie-taylor-greene-goes-full-blown-monster-with-horrendous-attack-on-transgender-admiral/) and [raging xenophobia](https://wegotthiscovered.com/politics/marjorie-taylor-greenes-rising-trump-thirst-pales-in-comparison-to-her-raging-xenophobia/). Not to mention worshipping a man who literally owes a woman millions upon millions for [being found liable for sexual abuse](https://wegotthiscovered.com/politics/its-only-january-and-donald-trump-is-already-facing-potential-bankruptcy/). Naturally, the supreme irony of MTG advising others on how to be good role models opened the door to a floodgate of mockery on social media. Not to put stock in tabloid rumors, or to pry into her private life, but Taylor Greene’s discussion of sexuality and traditional Christian values inevitably brought back memories of claims that she once had an affair with a man [The Daily Mail](https://go.skimresources.com/?id=100108X1555760&isjs=1&jv=15.4.2-stackpath&sref=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.vanityfair.com%2Fnews%2F2021%2F02%2Fmarjorie-taylor-greene-alleged-gym-affairs&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.dailymail.co.uk%2Fnews%2Farticle-9246917%2FMarjorie-Taylor-Green-openly-cheated-husband-men-gym.html&xs=1&xtz=0&xuuid=57d94a1a6f0633c49c7c0147d9e94e44&xjsf=other_click__auxclick%20%5B2%5D) described as a “polyamorous tantric sex guru.” In February 2021, Taylor Greene was accused of having “openly cheated” on her now-ex-husband Perry Greene with two men, [CrossFit gym manager Justin Tway ](https://wegotthiscovered.com/celebrities/does-marjorie-taylor-greene-do-crossfit/)and aforementioned guru Craig Ivey. She has denied the veracity of the claims, in the most MTG way possible, labeling them “ridiculous tabloid garbage spread by an avowed Communist.” Whether true or not, the reaction on X to her latest disturbing diatribe indicates that the accusations will continue to follow Marjorie around. Although, as [Vanity Fair](https://www.vanityfair.com/news/2021/02/marjorie-taylor-greene-alleged-gym-affairs) pointed out at the time, Taylor Greene actually (or openly) having polyamorous affairs with sex gurus would probably be better for the country, and perhaps women everywhere, and the whole wide world, than [tweeting out her every threadbare thought](https://wegotthiscovered.com/politics/unrelenting-loudmouth-marjorie-taylor-greene-curiously-quiet-as-donald-trump-names-vp-shortlist/).

author: Guest columnist - Unlimited Digital Access
title: Greater blessings when God leads you deeper into your faith
text: Pastor column: A guiding hand into a deeper relationship with God in the new year The prophet Ezekiel had a vision (Ezekiel 47:3-5) in which a man led him to the bank of a river. The man led Ezekiel out into the river to where he was standing in ankle-deep water. From there, the man led Ezekiel out where the water was knee-deep. Again the man led him further; now the water was waist-deep. One last time the man led Ezekiel out to the point that the prophet tried to follow but found that the water was a river deep enough to swim in. The man in Ezekiel's vision led him into ever deepening waters. The point of Ezekiel’s vision is that God wants to do this same thing in your life. Your spiritual experience with God is like that. He’s always leading you into a deeper relationship with Him, a deeper knowledge of Him, a deeper commitment to His will, a deeper level of fellowship with Him. Maybe you are at the ankle-deep level in your walk with the Lord. This is the step of faith to be saved, but it doesn't end there. Yes, He brought us out of darkness and into His marvelous light (1 Peter 2:9), but He also wants to lead us on. Many stop right here and never go one step farther with God. There is much more to being saved than just getting saved. Maybe you're at the knee-deep level walk with God Or maybe you have been walking with God for some time and now the Holy Spirit is taking you at the knee-deep level. The knees speak of prayer. This is a life that is learning dependence on the Lord. It’s activating our faith, trusting in the Lord with all your heart (Proverbs 3:5). At this level we know something of the power of the river. God calls you deeper. Don’t be satisfied with your present level. When you waded out waist deep into the river, more of the river and less of the man is seen. When we have waded out this far, we not only feel the power of the river but others can see its effect on us. At this level of maturity you can't hide its effects in your life. As deep as this level of spiritual growth is, it’s still not as deep as we can go! Ezekiel reached a point where the river was in control. He’s at the mercy of the river. This is the deepest spiritual level that any believer can reach. There’s three reasons why. When you are this deep, you have gone beyond your own ability. You have ceased to support yourself. You have given yourself up to the will of the river. You’ve surrendered totally to God and His will for your life. This is where God wants to get you. There will be greater blessings to be experienced and truths to be learned when you let God lead you deeper — until you are totally immersed in Him. Go deeper in 2024! Rev. J. Patrick Street is the lead pastor of Redeemer Church in Marion. He can be reached at [coachpatstreet@gmail.com](mailto:coachpatstreet@gmail.com).
